StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_SSRS_O.cerSelec.onBoardProgramResults]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body: ( @BOARDID VARCHAR(500) ) AS BEGIN SELECT RO_MCRC.SHORT_NAME AS 'MCRC' ,RO_REG.SHORT_NAME AS 'REGION' ,RO_DIST.SHORT_NAME AS 'DISTRICT' ,COUNT(CASE WHEN ((OCBSH.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 5) AND N.OFFICER_COMPONENT_CODE IN ('0C','1C')) THEN 1 END) AS 'NUM AIR SELECTED' ,COUNT(CASE WHEN ((OCBSH.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 5) AND N.OFFICER_COMPONENT_CODE IN ('0B','1B')) THEN 1 END) AS 'NUM GROUND SELECTED' ,COUNT(CASE WHEN ((OCBSH.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 5) AND N.OFFICER_COMPONENT_CODE IN ('0E','1A')) THEN 1 END) AS 'NUM LAW SELECTED' ,COUNT(CASE WHEN ((OCBSH.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 5) AND N.OFFICER_COMPONENT_CODE IN ('0A','1H')) THEN 1 END) AS 'NUM NFO SELECTED' ,COUNT(CASE WHEN ((OCBSH.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 5) AND N.OFFICER_COMPONENT_CODE IN ('1E')) THEN 1 END) AS 'NUM RESERVE SELECTED' ,COUNT(CASE WHEN ((OCBSH.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 4) AND N.OFFICER_COMPONENT_CODE IN ('0C','1C')) THEN 1 END) AS 'NUM AIR NON-SELECTED' ,COUNT(CASE WHEN ((OCBSH.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 4) AND N.OFFICER_COMPONENT_CODE IN ('0B','1B')) THEN 1 END) AS 'NUM GROUND NON-SELECTED' ,COUNT(CASE WHEN ((OCBSH.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 4) AND N.OFFICER_COMPONENT_CODE IN ('0E','1A')) THEN 1 END) AS 'NUM LAW NON-SELECTED' ,COUNT(CASE WHEN ((OCBSH.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 4) AND N.OFFICER_COMPONENT_CODE IN ('0A','1H')) THEN 1 END) AS 'NUM NFO NON-SELECTED' ,COUNT(CASE WHEN ((OCBSH.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 4) AND N.OFFICER_COMPONENT_CODE IN ('1E')) THEN 1 END) AS 'NUM RESERVE NON-SELECTED' FROM BOARD B INNER JOIN OFFICER_CONTRACT_BOARD OCB ON B.BOARD_ID = OCB.BOARD_ID INNER JOIN OFFICER_CONTRACT OC ON OCB.OFFICER_CONTRACT_ID = OC.CONTRACT_ID INNER JOIN OFFICER_CONTRACT_BOARD_STATUS_HISTORY OCBSH ON OCB.CONTRACT_BOARD_ID = OCBSH.CONTRACT_BOARD_ID AND OCBSH.BOARD_STATUS_ID IN (3,4,5) AND OCBSH.STATUS_DATE IN (SELECT MAX(STATUS_DATE) FROM OFFICER_CONTRACT_BOARD_STATUS_HISTORY OCBSH2 WHERE OCBSH2.BOARD_STATUS_ID IN (3,4,5) AND OCBSH2.CONTRACT_BOARD_ID = OCBSH.CONTRACT_BOARD_ID) INNER JOIN NWA N ON OC.NWA_ID = N.NWA_ID INNER JOIN ORGANIZATION_MAP RS ON N.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID = RS.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN ORGANIZATION_MAP DIST ON RS.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = DIST.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN ORGANIZATION_MAP REG ON DIST.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = REG.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN ORGANIZATION_MAP MCRC ON REG.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = MCRC.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION RO_DIST ON DIST.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = RO_DIST.ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION RO_REG ON REG.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = RO_REG.ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION RO_MCRC ON MCRC.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = RO_MCRC.ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN MARINE_CANDIDATE MC ON N.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = MC.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID INNER JOIN PERSON P ON MC.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = P.PERSON_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN MARINE M ON M.MARINE_ID = P.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN COMPONENT_CODE CC ON N.OFFICER_COMPONENT_CODE = CC.COMPONENT_CODE WHERE B.BOARD_ID IN (select * from dbo.SplitList(@BOARDID,',')) and OC.BOARD_STATUS_ID > 1 GROUP BY RO_MCRC.SHORT_NAME, RO_REG.SHORT_NAME, RO_DIST.SHORT_NAME END
